title: Basic Greetings
description: Learn essential Chinese greetings and introductions

grammar.title: Basic Sentence Structure
grammar.explanation: Chinese sentences typically follow Subject-Verb-Object (SVO) structure, similar to English.

exercises.question: How do you say 'Hello' in Chinese?
exercises.explanation: 你好 (nǐ hǎo) is the standard way to say hello in Chinese.

exercises.question: Translate 'Thank you' to Chinese
exercises.explanation: 谢谢 (xiè xiè) means thank you in Chinese.
